alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 3:31PM EST until January 13 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTRY WEATHER EXPECTED TO BRING SLIPPERY CONDITIONS TO THE AREA THURSDAY INTO FRIDAY... .Light to moderate snow will overspread New Hampshire and western Maine from Thursday morning and afternoon and continue into Thursday night, making for a slippery commute in the afternoon and evening hours. Some freezing rain is also possible Thursday evening and Thursday night. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THURSDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 6 inches and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of south central, west central, and western Maine. Portions of northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 1 PM Thursday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Periods of snow and freezing rain will combine with low visibility to create hazardous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
